title: Gabrielle Union stuns with new blonde hair color
text:
Gabrielle Union's new blonde look is a head-turner.

On Thursday, the "Being Mary Jane" star posted a selfie showing her with a platinum blonde bob, a pink blazer and matching pink eyeshadow.

"Turns out I'm not having any more fun than usual," Union joked in her caption.

A post shared by Gabrielle Union-Wade (@gabunion) on Sep 26, 2019 at 5:42pm PDT

Union's post has gained the attention of many with over 171,000 likes with many fans impressed by her bold new 'do.

This actually isn't the first time Union tried out a version of blonde. In 2016, she wore a honey blonde wavy version of the look styled by celebrity hairstylist Matthew Yates.

We can't wait to see what she does next!
description: Gabrielle Union showed off a brand new blonde hair color on Instagram.
